channel.title: I have My no-ip id and everyting how do i get it online now?
channel.description: Alright, so i have my no-ip id and everything, now the problem is that, idk what to do now!??!? :O This is my first server and ive been seeing people commenting stuff like "port forwarding" and other varietys but i realy am clueless.. please help me <3

item.title: I have My no-ip id and everyting how do i get it online now?
item.dc:creator: @RspsMania RspsMania
item.description:
@RspsMania wrote:

[quote=“Keatrm, post:4, topic:360568”]Hi mania
I just got my first server online today, and I was like you kinda :P[quote author=Keatrm link=topic=456883.msg3344100#msg3344100 date=1284678253]
Hi mania
I just got my first server online today, and I was like you kinda

  1. You MUST have a router! (netgear, belkin,etc…)
  2. Go to the computer you set your router up on, and go to internet, and open command prompt.
  3. in the command prompt, type ipconfig
  4. Look for “Default Gateway”, copy the number, and put it into the internet explorer browser bar.
  5. Log into your router (User- Admin Pass- Password, by default, changing it is recommended)
  6. Now go to portforward.com, find your router and model, and click on Runescape Private Servers on the next page.
  7. After doing all that, change the client.java / gui.java and put your ip
  8. Click “runserver.bat” in source files

(instructions above are valid for 317 servers :D)

Hope I helped ^^
[/quote]OMG! thanks so muchhh!!! your the best <3<3

  1. You MUST have a router! (netgear, belkin,etc…)
  2. Go to the computer you set your router up on, and go to internet, and open command prompt.
  3. in the command prompt, type ipconfig
  4. Look for “Default Gateway”, copy the number, and put it into the internet explorer browser bar.
  5. Log into your router (User- Admin Pass- Password, by default, changing it is recommended)
  6. Now go to portforward.com, find your router and model, and click on Runescape Private Servers on the next page.
  7. After doing all that, change the client.java / gui.java and put your ip
  8. Click “runserver.bat” in source files

(instructions above are valid for 317 servers :D)

Hope I helped ^^[/quote]H

Read full topic

item.title: I have My no-ip id and everyting how do i get it online now?
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Hi mania
I just got my first server online today, and I was like you kinda

  1. You MUST have a router! (netgear, belkin,etc…)
  2. Go to the computer you set your router up on, and go to internet, and open command prompt.
  3. in the command prompt, type ipconfig
  4. Look for “Default Gateway”, copy the number, and put it into the internet explorer browser bar.
  5. Log into your router (User- Admin Pass- Password, by default, changing it is recommended)
  6. Now go to portforward.com, find your router and model, and click on Runescape Private Servers on the next page.
  7. After doing all that, change the client.java / gui.java and put your ip
  8. Click “runserver.bat” in source files

(instructions above are valid for 317 servers :D)

Hope I helped ^^
